InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S5 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 5

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M6A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 4

Behring's M6A is a versatile high velocity energy autocannon, designed to provide to keep your enemy at range without sacrificing your stopping power.

InstalledItem.Name: FullBlock
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Military

Crafted by former residents of Caliban, Gorgon’s FullBlock large shield generator has been repeatedly put to the test by members of the military and public. That means you can count on it regardless of what you come up against.

InstalledItem.Name: SuperDrive
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Military

A&R’s award winning customer service sets the SuperDrive apart from other military power plants in its class. Consumers love that they can depend on both the component and company when the going gets tough.

InstalledItem.Name: Mercury
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Military

In combat situations, even the smallest advantage can lead to big gains. With Aegis’ Mercury cooling system onboard, you’ll be able to push your ship hotter for longer when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Pontes
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Military

When placed under stress tests, the proprietary alloys used by Wei-Tek to build the Pontes proved themselves against competitors in the same class.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
